entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
